feed.title: Feed
feed.emptyDescription: Start by logging your first activity
feed.comingSoonDescription: The social feed will enable you to exchange experiences and knowledge with your unit and other first responders, and learn from each other.
feed.featureSocial: Connect with your unit and other people
feed.featureMedia: Share photos and videos from operations

activity.title: Activity
activity.logDescription: Document your operations, drills and training
activity.galleryPermissionRequired: Please grant access to your gallery
activity.cameraPermissionRequired: Please grant access to your camera
activity.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this activity?
activity.categoryPlaceholder: e.g. "A1, Brand klein", "D2, Ã–l mittel", etc.
activity.durationRequired: Duration is required and must be greater than 0
activity.reportPlaceholder: Description or report of the activity

logbook.title: My Logbook
logbook.emptyDescription: Start logging your first activity to build your logbook
logbook.noResultsDescription: No activities found matching your search criteria

profile.title: Profile
profile.name: Name
profile.resetPasswordConfirm: Would you like to receive a password reset link via email?
profile.resetPasswordSent: A password reset link has been sent to your email address
profile.photoPermissionRequired: We need access to your photos to select a profile picture
profile.cameraPermissionRequired: We need access to your camera to take a profile picture
profile.noActivitiesDescription: Start logging your first activity to track your progress

settings.title: Settings
settings.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to log out?

auth.enterEmailForReset: Please enter your email address to receive a password reset link.
auth.checkEmailForReset: Check your email for a password reset link. If you don't see it, check your spam folder.
auth.resetPasswordFailed: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again.
auth.passwordResetSuccessMessage: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now sign in with your new password.
auth.invalidResetLink: Invalid or expired reset link. Please request a new password reset.
auth.confirmationEmailInvalid: Invalid or expired confirmation link. Please request a new confirmation email.
auth.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
auth.emailAlreadyExists: This email address is already registered
auth.emailAlreadyRegistered: This email address is already registered.
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.demoHint: Demo mode: Use any email and password to test
auth.confirmEmailSubtitle: We've sent you a confirmation link
auth.confirmEmailInstructions: Please check your email and click the confirmation link to activate your account. The link will expire in 1 hour.
auth.confirmEmailHelp: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or click the button below to resend.
auth.confirmationEmailSent: Confirmation email sent! Please check your inbox.
auth.resendConfirmationFailed: Failed to resend confirmation email. Please try again.

errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.notAuthenticated: You must be logged in to perform this action

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Manage your privacy settings and control who can see your data.
privacy.showStatisticsDescription: Others can see your activity statistics
privacy.marketingConsentDescription: Receive updates about new features and offers
privacy.dataRightsDescription: You have the right to access, rectify, and delete your data.
privacy.exportDataConfirm: Do you want to export all your data as a JSON file?
privacy.deleteAccountWarning: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be anonymized.
privacy.confirmDeleteMessage: Your account and all associated data will be anonymized immediately. This action cannot be undone.
privacy.deleteRequestSubmitted: Deletion request submitted. You will be logged out.
privacy.gdprCompliant: This app is GDPR-compliant and respects your privacy.

consent.title: Privacy & Consent
consent.description: We respect your privacy. Please review and accept the following consents to continue.
consent.dataProcessingDescription: We process your data to provide app functionality, log your activities, and improve your experience.
consent.marketingDescription: Receive updates about new features, tips, and occasional offers via email.
consent.changeAnytime: You can change these settings anytime in Privacy Settings.
